#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include <math.h>
 
int divPair[500001];
bool perfectSq[500001],isMod;
int readUInt()
{
 	int c = getc(stdin);
	while(c > '9' || c < '0')	c = getc(stdin);
	int n = 0;
	while(c <= '9' && c >= '0')
	{
		n = n*10 + c - '0';
		c = getc(stdin);
	}
	return n;
}
 
int modPow(int a, int b, int mod)
{
	int ans = 1;
	while(b > 0)
	{
		if(a >= mod)
		{
			a %= mod;
			isMod = true;
		}
 
		if(b%2)
			ans *= a;
 
		if(ans >= mod)
		{
			ans %= mod;
			isMod = true;
		}
 
		a *= a;
		b /= 2;
	}
	return ans;
}
 
int main()
{
	int i,j,s;
	s = sqrt(500000);
	for(i = 2; i <= s; i++)
	{
		perfectSq[i*i] = true;
		for(j = i+1; i*j < 500001; j++)
		{
			divPair[i*j]++;
		}
	}
 
	int t = readUInt();
	while(t--)
	{
		isMod = false;
		int n = readUInt();
		int ans  = modPow(n,divPair[n],10000);
		if(perfectSq[n])	ans *= sqrt(n);
		if(ans >= 10000)
		{
			ans %= 10000;
			isMod = true;
		}
		if(isMod)	printf("%04d\n",ans);
		else	printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
